title: Matriarch: Heartbeat of the Pear Blossoms Falls Late - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Assassins   Betrayal   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Childhood Promise   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Matriarchy   Multiple Protagonists   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters
author: 琉璃九颜
description: That year, he was five, while she was eleven. They met when it was the season of pear blossoms. A trivial thing, he kept her in his heart for eleven years. Another chance encounter and her return filled him with ecstasy. This time, he won’t just watch her in silence. He’ll take the initiative to fight for her. Mu Yunluo, you won’t be able to run. Let us… fall in love with each other!>
